arStrings.szText: You deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|%x|]{/c} increased Burning damage to enemies below {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1" * 100|%|]{/c} Life. Additionally, you deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased Burning damage to enemies while they are affected by more Damage Over Time than their total Life.

You deal {c_random}[Affix_Value_2|%x|]{/c} increased Burning damage to injured enemies and {c_random}[Affix_Value_1|%x|]{/c} increased Burning damage to enemies affected by more Damage Over Time than their total Life.
